616480.name: Fantasy Grounds - Heroic Characters 11 (Token Pack)
616480.description:
Heroic Characters 11

This token pack contains 30 tokens. This pack contains new heroic characters.
This Token Pack includes:
  • Female Dragon Fighter
  • Female Dragonborn Fighter
  • Female Elven Druid
  • Female Half-Elf Rogue
  • 2 Female Half-Orc Monks
  • 2 Female Half-Orc Strikers
  • Female Tiefling Sworder
  • Male Aasimar Cleric
  • Male Aasimar Druid
  • Male Aasimar Fighter
  • Male Dragonborn Fighter
  • Male Dragonborn Paladin
  • Male Dwarf Axe Fighter
  • Male Dwarf Cleric
  • Male Dwarf Druid
  • Male Dwarf Paladin
  • Male Elemental Fighter
  • Male Elf Battle Mage
  • Male Gnome Druid
  • Male Gnome Monk
  • Male Gnome Tinker
  • Male Gnome Wizard
  • Male Goliath Ranger
  • Male Half-Elf Wild Ranger
  • Male Half-Elf Wizard
  • Male Half-Orc Chef
  • Male Tiefling Barbarian
  • Male Tiefling Cleric
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
